Text Structure

Formal description of text structure, subclasses, related classes, and properties.
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
text-structure
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
and
Reto Baumgartner, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Z端rich, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text structure, subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Text and text editing are described in other ontologies
and
Prosodic structure and note structure are described in other ontologies (en)
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Z端rich, Switzerland
rdfs:seeAlso
https://files.ifi.uzh.ch/ cl/ siclemat/ lehre/ hs09/ ecl1/ script/ html/ script.html
dct:title
An ontology about text structure
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

text-structure:Column
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a column.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure
text-structure:ColumnLine
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text line of a text column.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
skos:note
Maximum length of a column line equals the column width.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Line
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content text structure depending on text composition, e.g. a paragraph, section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
and
text-structure:CompositionalStructure
text-structure:CompositionalStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on text composition in a two-dimensional plane, e.g. a line, paragraph, section, page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Structure
text-structure:ContentStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on text content, e.g. a paragraph, section, prose, citation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Structure
text-structure:Dialogue
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with dialogue structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-structure:Diary
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with diary structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:label
diary structure (en)
,
Tagebuch-Struktur (de)
,
structure de journal (fr)
and
struttura del diario (it)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-structure:Identifier
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Identifier of a text structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:label

,
identifiant de structure de texte (fr)
,
identificatore della struttura del testo (it)
and
Textstrukturidentifikator (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
document:ContentStructureIdentifier
text-structure:Line
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a line, filling a two-dimensional space, with an orientation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

,

and

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Ordinal number of a text line.

text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:LineIdentifier
and
mathematics:OrdinalNumber
text-structure:LineSpace
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Empty space between orthographic words in a text line.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure
text-structure:OrthographicWord
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Smallest independent orthographic entity composed of symbols, surrounded by whitespace in a written text line.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
linguistics:Concept
and
text:WrittenText
text-structure:OrthographoSyntacticWord
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Word being orthographic and syntactic.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
skos:note
Common word.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:OrthographicWord
and
text-structure:SyntacticWord
text-structure:Page
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
document:Page
and
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure
text-structure:PageLine
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text line of a text page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:label
page text line (en)
,
ligne de texte de page (fr)
,
Textzeile einer Seite (de)
and
riga di testo di pagina (it)
skos:note
In case of a horizontal line, its maximum length equals the page width minus margins.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Line
text-structure:Paragraph
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Composition of sentences ending with a line break.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:SentenceStructure
and
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-structure:Postcard
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with postcard structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-structure:Prose
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Syntactic structure with a sentence as unit, in a natural flow of speech.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:SentenceStructure
text-structure:Punctuation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
One or more language symbols in written text, different from a letter, to help interpret semantics of a sentence.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure
,
text-structure:SyntacticStructure
and
linguistics:Symbol
text-structure:ReadabilityStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Compositional text structure providing text readability, e.g. a line, column, page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text:SurfaceText
and
text-structure:CompositionalStructure
text-structure:Rhyme
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Words or phrases with whole or end corresponding sound, especially when involving the last stressed vowel and all succeeding sounds.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
text-structure:ScientificStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content text structure depending on scientific purpose, e.g. a critical apparatus.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
text-structure:Section
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Composition of paragraphs, mostly about a certain topic.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:SentenceStructure
and
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-structure:SectionIdentifier
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Identifier of a text section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:label
text section identifier (en)
and
Textabschnittidentifikator (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Identifier
text-structure:SectionOrdinalNumber
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Ordinal number of a text section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:SectionIdentifier
and
mathematics:OrdinalNumber
text-structure:Sentence
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Syntactic structure comprising one or more linked syntactic words, basically a subject and predicate.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
and
text-structure:SyntacticStructure
text-structure:SentenceStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content structure depending on sentences, e.g. a paragraph, section, prose
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:ContentStructure
text-structure:Structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text as structure abstracted from its carrier, e.g. a word, sentence, text line, paragraph, section, verse, strophe, citation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
skos:note
Making up a text expression, without necessarily being one itself.
rdfs:subClassOf
text:Text
and
document:ContentStructure
text-structure:SurfaceSentence
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Sentence expressed on a surface.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
skos:note
A surface sentence can be considered as a syntactic directed text line or text vector.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Sentence
and
text-structure:Line
text-structure:SyntacticStructure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on natural language-specific syntax, e.g. a word, sentence.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:Structure
text-structure:SyntacticWord
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Smallest independent syntactic structure composed of symbols that can be replaced in a sentence or verse.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:label
syntactic word (en)
,
syntaktisches Wort (de)
,
mot syntaxique (fr)
and
parola sintattica (it)
rdfs:subClassOf
linguistics:Concept
and
text-structure:SyntacticStructure
text-structure:Table
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Two-dimensional structure composed of one or more fields containing text, and being part of a vertical column and a horizontal row, both with own identifier.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-structure
rdfs:subClassOf
document:Table
and
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
